reporter-output.line: Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'Pixelman' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Enter 'MPS' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Verify the 'MPS' check box is checked.
Enter 'Devel' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Verify the 'Devel' check box is checked.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPS Configuration dialog'.
Enter '' in the 'Pattern for Category Field' text box.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify '"cat":"content"' is not present in page source.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Movie dialog'.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Movie dialog'.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Movie dialog'.
Select the 'Syndicated' from the 'Movie Type' drop down list.
Select the 'G' from the 'Rating' drop down list.
Select the 'Action' from the 'Primary Genre' drop down list.
Verify success message of 'Movie cffe00aa29f9402 has been created.' is present.
Verify '"cat":"content"' is present in page source.
Click the 'Edit Draft' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit Movie cffe00aa29f9402 dialog'.
Uncheck the 'Generate automatic URL alias' check box.
Enter '081083525a' in the 'URL alias' text box.
Verify success message of 'Movie cffe00aa29f9402 has been updated.' is present.
Verify '"cat":"081083525a"' is present in page source.
Click the 'Edit Draft' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit Movie cffe00aa29f9402 dialog'.
Enter '081083525a/mps-testing/2arg/3arg/4arg/5arg/6arg' in the 'URL alias' text box.
Verify success message of 'Movie cffe00aa29f9402 has been updated.' is present.
Verify '"cat":"081083525a|mps-testing|2arg"}' is present in page source.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPS Configuration dialog'.
Verify the 'MPS CAT Property' link with text '[mps:cat-pattern:?]' is present.
Enter '[mps:cat-pattern:?]' in the 'Pattern for Category Field' text box.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify '"cat":"081083525a|mps-testing|2arg|3arg|4arg"}' is present in page source.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Execute PHP Code dialog'.

Enter 'variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '');echo _mps_build_cat();echo PHP_EOL;variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '[mps:cat-pattern:?]');echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season/episode/cast'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/thisisareallyreallyreallyreallyreallyreallylongurlXXXXXX/season/episode/cast/name'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/thisisareallyreallyreallyreallyreallyreallylongurlXXXXXX/season/episode/cast/'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show//episode/cast'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season/episode/'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season//episode//'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => '/show/season//'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => '/show///'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => '/brand/season//episode'));echo PHP_EOL;variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '[mps:cat-pattern:2]|[mps:cat-pattern:3]');echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season/episode/cast'));echo PHP_EOL;variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '[mps:cat-pattern:0]|[mps:cat-pattern:2]|[current-date:custom:d]|[mps:cat-pattern:3]|');echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season/episode/cast'));variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '[mps:cat-pattern:?]');echo PHP_EOL;echo '*' . _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => '/')) . '*';' in the 'PHP Code to Execute' text area.

Verify the expected response is 'Status message devel brand|show|season|episode brand|thisisareallyreallyreallyreallyreallyreallylongurl|season|episode|cast brand|thisisareallyreallyreallyreallyreallyreallylongurl|season|episode|cast brand|show|~|episode brand|show|season brand|show|season|~|episode ~|show
~|brand|season season|episode brand|season|25 **'.

Enter 'variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '');echo _mps_build_cat();echo PHP_EOL;variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '[mps:cat-pattern:?]');echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season/episode/cast'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/thisisareallyreallyreallyreallyreallyreallylongurlXXXXXX/season/episode/cast/name'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/thisisareallyreallyreallyreallyreallyreallylongurlXXXXXX/season/episode/cast/'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show//episode/cast'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season/episode/'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season//episode//'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => '/show/season//'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => '/show///'));echo PHP_EOL;echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => '/brand/season//episode'));echo PHP_EOL;variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '[mps:cat-pattern:2]|[mps:cat-pattern:3]');echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season/episode/cast'));echo PHP_EOL;variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '[mps:cat-pattern:0]|[mps:cat-pattern:2]|[current-date:custom:d]|[mps:cat-pattern:3]|');echo _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => 'brand/show/season/episode/cast'));variable_set('mps_cat_pattern', '[mps:cat-pattern:?]');echo PHP_EOL;echo '*' . _mps_build_cat(array('aliased-path' => '/')) . '*';' in the 'PHP Code to Execute' text area.

~|brand|season season|episode brand|season|25 **'.
